entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except south 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except south 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 17 February 2023
